titles: Articles to be enquired of, throughout the whole diocesse of Chichester ministred and giuen in charge to the church-wardens and sidemen within the same diocesse by the reuerend father in God        Richard by Gods prouidence Bishop of Chichester, in his generall visitation holden anno Domini 1631.
author: Church of England. Diocese of Chichester. Bishop (1628-1638 : Montagu)
Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.
publisher: Printed by R.Y. for Thomas Bourne,
notes: Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Cambridge). Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Pastoral letters and charges.
